// By manrajsingh
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define d1(a)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<"\n";
#define d2(a,b)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<"\n";
#define d3(a,b,c)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<"\n";
#define d4(a,b,c,d)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<" , "<<#d<<": "<<d<<"\n";

int main() {
	ll n,k;
	string s;
	cin>>n>>k>>s;
	string ans="";
	for(int i=0;i<k;i++){
		int ctr[3]={0};
		int x=i;
		while(x<s.length()){
			ctr[s[x]-'a']++;
			x+=k;
		}
		if(ctr[0]>=max(ctr[1],ctr[2])){
			ans+="a";
		}
		else if(ctr[1]>=max(ctr[0],ctr[2])){
			ans+="b";
		}
		else{
			ans+="c";
		}
	}
	cout<<ans;
	return 0;
}
